{{Wireless embedded system |brand=Adtran |model=6304W |fcc_date=08/21/2017 |is_manuf=No |type=fiber gateway |fcc_id=HDC6304W |pwr_v=12 |pwr_amp=2 |pwr_conn=barrel |cpu1_brand=Broadcom |cpu1_model=BCM68380 |fla1=128 |fla1_brand=Micron |fla1_model=MT29F1G08ABAEA |ram1=256 |ram1_brand=SK hynix |ram1_model=H5TQ2G63GFR |expansion_if_types=USB 2.0 |expansion_usb_num=2 |wi1_chip1_brand=Broadcom |wi1_chip1_model=BCM43602;BCM43602KMLG, TN1611 P11, 580096-55 3A W; |wi1_802dot11_protocols=an+ac |wi1_txchains=3 |wi1_rxchains=3 |wi1_sstreams=3 |wi2_chip1_brand=Broadcom |wi2_chip1_model=BCM43217;BCM43217KMLG, TD1635 P10, 618859-74 1 W; |wi2_802dot11_protocols=bgn |wi2_txchains=2 |wi2_rxchains=2 |wi2_sstreams=2 |eth_cpu=true |sw_cpu=true |lan_speed=1G |lan_ports=4 |flags=TR-069 |802dot11_protocols=abgn+ac }}
:• '''1200Mbps''' - 3SS 5GHz [https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/IEEE_802.11ac#Data_rates_and_speed 802.11ac] (80MHz chan.), :• '''300Mbps''' - 2SS 2.4GHz [https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/IEEE_802.11n-2009#Data_rates 802.11n] (40MHz chan.) = '''''1500 Mbps'' class'''
{{TagLine|EPON Residential Gateway (RG) Optical Network Unit}} :{{ProductPage|https://portal.adtran.com/web/page/portal/Adtran/product/1766304WF1/4553}} {{•}} [https://portal.adtran.com/pub/Library/Data_Sheets/Default_Public/61766304WF1-8_ADTRAN%206304W.pdf Datasheet] ===Features and Benefits=== * 802.3ah GEPON port with 1.25Gbps bi-direction link speed * 4x 10/100/1000BASE-T Ethernet RJ45 Ports * 2x2 11n, up to 300Mbps wireless connectivity * 3x3 11ac, up to 1200Mbps wireless connectivity :(Typo? Should be 1300Mbps for 3x3 ac) * 2x FXS for VoIP service * 2x USB ports in Host mode * Wall adaptor with 90~264VAC input, 12VDC output * 0 to 40°C operating ambient temperature
